WorkItem.Description:
I have windows 10 pro. 
While using turbo c++.
First program runs and execute properly.But after going back to code.
My mouse or touch pad gets stuck. Its stop working In MS-DOS only.
After exiting MS-DOS and restarting turbo C++ my mouse starts working. But only after executing first program and going back to code .mouse stop working.Only my keyboard stay working.
Please suggest...What to do..

Comments.Message:
This is happens because of Turbo C++ 3.0 a 16-bit software and I'm using DosBox to run Turbo C++ for 32&64-bit OS. DosBox is a simulating tools, specially design to run 16-bit games on 32&64-bit OS. 

So, problem is that, DosBox design to operate with keyboard. When you tried to use mouse it's works for only few click.

Solution of this problem is Turbo C++ shortcut. You can find out here
[https://turboc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Turbo%20CPP%20Shortcuts](https://turboc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Turbo%20CPP%20Shortcuts)
